Container.Name: MySQL
Container.Overview: MySQL strives to be the logical choice for database professionals looking for a robust, scalable, and reliable SQL server.
Container.Description: MySQL strives to be the logical choice for database professionals looking for a robust, scalable, and reliable SQL server. [br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/db[/b] : this path is where the MySQL database files are stored to.
